    • Method Detail

      • changePassword

        boolean changePassword(User user,
                       java.lang.String currentPassword,
                       java.lang.String newPassword)
        Changes a password specific user.
        Parameters:
        user - whose we want to change a pass.
        currentPassword - current password of user's account.
        newPassword - new password of specific user.
        Returns:
        true is changing password is successfully completed, otherwise false.

      • getClientList

        java.util.List<Client> getClientList()
        Selects all information about client.
        Returns:
        client list (if there are no clients in database, returns null).

      • getTaxiList

        java.util.List<Taxi> getTaxiList()
        Selects all information about taxi drivers.
        Returns:
        taxi drivers list (if there are no taxi drivers in database, returns null).

      • getAvailableTaxiList

        java.util.List<Taxi> getAvailableTaxiList()
        Selects all information about taxi drivers available at the moment .
        Returns:
        available taxi drivers list.

      • changeBanStatus

        void changeBanStatus(User user)
        Changes ban status.
        Parameters:
        user - we want to ban/unban.

      • changeBonusCount

        void changeBonusCount(Client client)
        changes amount of bonuses specific client.
        Parameters:
        client - whose amount of bonuses we want to change.

      • changeTaxiCar

        void changeTaxiCar(Taxi taxi)
        Changes taxi driver's car.
        Parameters:
        taxi - whose car we want change.

      • getHashPassword

        java.lang.String getHashPassword(java.lang.String mail)
        receives hash password of user according with e-mail.
        Parameters:
        mail - of client whose hash password we want to receive.
        Returns:
        hash password.

      • restorePassword

        boolean restorePassword(java.lang.String mail,
                        java.lang.String hashPassword,
                        java.lang.String newPassword)
        Changes user password if hash password and mail of specific user are correct.
        Parameters:
        mail - of client we want to restore the password.
        hashPassword - of client we want to restore the password.
        newPassword - we want to set instead of old one.
        Returns:
        true if action is successfully, otherwise false.
